bio.line1: Hey. I am Artem, a full-stack /ML developer and freelancer.
bio.line2: I am 18 years old, I have been studying at the programming academy for 5 years and developing on a freelance basis.
bio.line3: I strive to develop in the field of development and want to work on large projects that can improve people's lives
bio.line4: You can view all projects on my git

projects_data.owl: OWL - task and project management app designed specifically for developers
projects_data.ipsa: Telegram is an investment assistant bot with neural network and other functions
projects_data.loginsight: Program for analyzing log files and detecting anomalies in program operation
projects_data.mfetch: A simple fetch tool for Linux written in bash
projects_data.cv_creator: A bot for selling improvement services or selling resumes
projects_data.codekeeper: Project and task manager for developers with Git

reviews_list.name: Andrey Ponomarev
reviews_list.text: Helped to solve the task quickly, answered all my questions along the way, and was always in touch. Recommend!

reviews_list.name: Max Solonenko
reviews_list.text: Great seller, completed the order quickly and with quality.

reviews_list.name: alik7107
reviews_list.text: Ordered Qt framework configuration. The job was done professionally, I recommend!

reviews_list.name: Andrey Andreevich
reviews_list.text: We developed a Telegram bot quite quickly and were in constant contact with Artem. Artem did all the development, I just helped and tested. In fact, we started around 8 am and finished by 12, which is very good (the bot was tested and deployed on my server). I recommend Artem as a responsible and efficient developer.
